text: Javier Gonzales (1966 â€“ February 9, 2022) was an American Democratic politician. He was the 42nd Mayor of Santa Fe, New Mexico from 2014 to 2018."Javier Gonzales wins Santa Fe mayoral race". Santa Fe New Mexican, March 4, 2014. Gonzales was the city's first and only openly gay mayor."Santa Fe Selects Its First Gay Mayor, Javier Gonzales". The Advocate, March 5, 2014. He was chair of the Democratic Party of New Mexico from 2009 until 2013. Gonzales died from cancer at a hospital in Santa Fe on February 9, 2022, at the age of 55. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in New Mexico Category:Mayors of Santa Fe, New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:American LGBT politicians Category:Gay men
title: Javier Gonzales
